content.prompt: The visual organization of the work is meant to suggest a

choices.label: solemn procession as part of a civic ceremony
sequence of successive events in an important narrative
contrast between orderly control and chaotic drama
strict hierarchy between the relative importance of the figures

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
